To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Engulfing _engulfing;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_engulfing = Engulfing(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_engulfing.IsReady)
{
    var current = _engulfing.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.engulfing = self.Engulfing(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.engulfing.IsReady:
    current = self.engulfing.Current.Value
